title: The Shield and the Sword, Episode One | WAR DRAMA

sources.title: The Shield and the Sword, Episode One | WAR DRAMA
sources.description:
Playlist with all episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7EqAsBxqGgiOi3VY4myWjS4xaXynhOmB

Episode two: https://youtu.be/FcLeohxgUBU
Episode three: https://youtu.be/e1k0_p1TXW8
Episode four: https://youtu.be/UlF7M4VPK0o

Screen adaptation of the novel by V. Kozhevnikov. Four films tell about the exploits of Soviet intelligence officers during the Second World War. The plot centers on the image of the brave intelligence officer Alexander Belov, who works in the Third Reich under the name Johann Weiss. He neutralizes sabotage groups thrown into our territory. And after being transferred to the SS, Belov has the opportunity to preempt the start of major military operations...

IMDb rating: 7.8

Year of production: 1967

Director: Basov Vladimir
Writers: Basov Vladimir, Kozhevnikov Vadim
Composer: Basner Veniamin
Operator: Lebeshev Timofey
Production designer: Parkhomenko Alexey

Cast: Nikolay Penkov, Alexey Glazyrin, Vsevolod Safonov, Sergey Plotnikov, Georgy Martynyuk, Valentina Titova, Maria Pastukhova, Sergey Papov, Konstantin Tyrtov, Igor Bezyaev, Masyulis Algimantas, Frorip Jurgen, Vladimir Basov, Stanislav Lyubshin, Olga Zhizneva, Oleg Yankovsky, and others.
